title: SMNTY Classics: Where the f*** are the pockets on women's clothing?
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Where the f*** are the pockets on women's clothing?
description:
After a disatrous search for a dress with pockets, Anney wanted to revisit this classic. E&B break down the quest for pocket equality.
